timestamp.description: The date+timestamp which identifies the point in time, where the information was generated, including milliseconds.

name.description: The name of the parameter for which the value is changed.

newValue.description: The new/requested value of the parameter.

type.description:
The type of a parameter value.
Encoding / formatting follow the same rules as JSON encoding (i.e. String encoding = UTF8, dates = ISO 8601, booleans = true/false)

oldValue.description: The current/previous value of the parameter.

description: Contains exactly one main element, based on the use case (XOR).
